meanings.definition: A sulfur-containing amino acid found in many proteins.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the cystines in the protein structure.
meanings.sent2: Cystines are important building blocks for proteins in our body.
meanings.sent3: The cystines in the protein were having a party, bonding together tightly.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was like the strong bond between cystines in a protein chain.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the cystines appeared like tiny sulfur gems holding the protein together.

meanings.definition: A type of chemical compound containing two cysteine molecules linked by a disulfide bond.
meanings.sent1: The researchers synthesized cystines for their experiment.
meanings.sent2: The disulfide bond in cystines gives them unique properties.
meanings.sent3: The cystines in the lab were gossiping about their strong bond.
meanings.sent4: Their partnership was as stable as the disulfide bond in cystines.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the cystines in the lab was distinct due to the disulfide bond.
